00001 package modules.taskModule.actions;
00002 
00003 import java.awt.Color;
00004 import java.awt.Font;
00005 import java.awt.Graphics;
00006 import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
00007 import java.util.Hashtable;
00008 import java.util.Vector;
00009 
00010 import modules.taskModule.TaskModule;
00011 import newtonERP.module.AbstractAction;
00012 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00013 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00014 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00015 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.BaseViewerData;
00016 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.ImgViewerData;
00017 
00022 public class DbGraph extends AbstractAction
00023 {
00024         private Hashtable<String, VisualEntity> vEntity;
00025         private int maxX;
00026         private int maxY;
00027 
00030         public DbGraph()
00031         {
00032                 super(null);
00033         }
00034 
00035         @Override
00036         public BaseViewerData doAction(AbstractEntity sourceFieldEntity,
00037                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00038         {
00039                 maxX = 0;
00040                 maxY = 0;
00041                 vEntity = new Hashtable<String, VisualEntity>();
00042                 visualGraph vgraph = new visualGraph();
00043                 vgraph.designGraph();
00044                 BufferedImage bi = new BufferedImage(maxX, maxY + 8,
00045                                 BufferedImage.TYPE_BYTE_BINARY);
00046                 Graphics g = bi.getGraphics();
00047                 g.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00048                 g.fillRect(0, 0, bi.getWidth(), bi.getHeight());
00049                 g.setColor(Color.BLACK);
00050                 for (VisualEntity entity : vEntity.values())
00051                 {
00052                         g.drawImage(entity.getDrawEntity(), entity.x, entity.y, null);
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 ImgViewerData ret = new ImgViewerData(bi, "testPic");
00056                 ret.setTitle("shema de la DB");
00057                 return ret;
00058         }
00059 
00060         private class visualGraph
00061         {
00062                 Vector<String> tmpEntityNameList;
00063                 int nextx;
00064                 int presenty;
00065 
00066                 public visualGraph()
00067                 {
00068                         nextx = 0;
00069                         presenty = 0;
00070                         for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : new TaskModule()
00071                                         .getEntityDefinitionList().values())
00072                                 vEntity.put(entity.getSystemName(), new VisualEntity(entity));
00073 
00074                         tmpEntityNameList = new Vector<String>();
00075                         for (String str : vEntity.keySet())
00076                         {
00077                                 tmpEntityNameList.add(str);
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 public void designGraph()
00082                 {
00083                         for (VisualEntity entity : vEntity.values())
00084                         {
00085                                 if (tmpEntityNameList.remove(entity.entity.getSystemName()))
00086                                 {
00087                                         drawGraph(entity);
00088                                 }
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091 
00092                 public void drawGraph(VisualEntity entity)
00093                 {
00094                         if (nextx > 500)
00095                         {
00096                                 nextx = 0;
00097                                 presenty = maxY + 10;
00098                         }
00099                         entity.x = nextx;
00100                         nextx += entity.width + 15;
00101                         if (maxX < nextx)
00102                                 maxX = nextx;
00103 
00104                         entity.y = presenty;
00105                         if (maxY < entity.height + presenty)
00106                                 maxY = entity.height + presenty;
00107 
00108                         /*
00109                          * VisualEntity currentEntity; entity.entity.get("1=1");
00110                          * System.out.println(entity.entity.getSystemName());
00111                          * 
00112                          * for (String entityName : entity.entity.getSingleAccessorList()
00113                          * .keySet()) { currentEntity = vEntity.get(entityName); if
00114                          * (tmpEntityNameList.remove(currentEntity.entity .getSystemName()))
00115                          * { entity.x = nextx; nextx += entity.width + 15; if (maxX < nextx)
00116                          * maxX = nextx;
00117                          * 
00118                          * entity.y = presenty; if (maxY < entity.height + presenty) maxY =
00119                          * entity.height + presenty; } }
00120                          */
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 
00124         private class VisualEntity
00125         {
00126                 private AbstractOrmEntity entity;
00127 
00128                 private final static int lineHeight = 14;
00129                 private final static int marge = 2;
00130                 private final static int pad = 5;
00131                 private final static int charWidth = 8;
00132                 int inx = marge + pad;
00133                 int x = marge;
00134                 int iny = marge + lineHeight;
00135                 int y = marge;
00136                 int width = 1;
00137                 int height = 1;
00138 
00139                 public VisualEntity(AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00140                 {
00141                         this.entity = entity;
00142                         width = entity.getSystemName().length() * charWidth;
00143 
00144                         for (Field<?> fld : entity.getFields())
00145                         {
00146                                 if (fld.getShortName().length() * charWidth > width)
00147                                         width = fld.getShortName().length() * charWidth;
00148                         }
00149                         height = (entity.getFields().getFields().size() + 1) * lineHeight
00150                                         + 2 * marge;
00151                 }
00152 
00156                 public BufferedImage getDrawEntity()
00157                 {
00158                         BufferedImage bi = new BufferedImage(width + 2 * marge + pad,
00159                                         height + 2 * marge, BufferedImage.TYPE_BYTE_BINARY);
00160                         Graphics g = bi.getGraphics();
00161                         g.setColor(Color.BLACK);
00162                         g.fillRect(0, 0, bi.getWidth(), bi.getHeight());
00163                         g.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00164 
00165                         g.setFont(new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, Font.BOLD, lineHeight - 2));
00166                         g.drawString(entity.getSystemName(), inx, iny);
00167                         iny += lineHeight;
00168                         g.setFont(new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, 0, lineHeight - 2));
00169                         for (Field<?> fld : entity.getFields())
00170                         {
00171                                 g.drawString(fld.getShortName(), inx, iny);
00172                                 iny += lineHeight;
00173                         }
00174                         g.drawRect(marge, marge, width + pad, height);
00175                         g.drawLine(marge, lineHeight + marge, width + pad + 1, lineHeight
00176                                         + marge);
00177                         return bi;
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 }
